short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add GPT-generated insights to Google Search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GPT Search Companion™
GPT Search Companion™ is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your Google search experience with the power of advanced GPT technology. Our focus is on delivering a clean, uncluttered user interface that enhances your search results without adding any unnecessary features. By leveraging OpenAI's GPT models, this extension analyzes your search queries and provides additional insights and summaries to help you quickly find the information you truly need.

Features:

Enhanced Search Results: Utilizes GPT technology to analyze your searches and offer additional background, explanations, or brief answers.
Clean User Experience: Our goal is to enhance, not replace. This extension adds value without altering the original Google search interface.
Privacy-Conscious: Your search queries are only used to generate enhanced content; we do not store any personal data.
Easy Setup: Just a few simple steps to configure your OpenAI API key, and you're ready to go.
How to Use:

Install GPT Search Companion™ on your Chrome browser.
Click on the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar to open the settings page.
Enter your OpenAI API key in the settings page and save it.
Begin your Google searches and enjoy enhanced results provided by GPT.
By integrating the latest in artificial intelligence technology, GPT Search Companion for Google™ offers additional knowledge and depth to every search. Whether for learning, research, or simple curiosity, it becomes an indispensable companion for your search endeavors. Install now and experience the difference!
